cast.overview: Two mismatched entrepreneurs – egghead innovator Mike Lazaridis and cut-throat businessman Jim Balsillie – joined forces in an endeavour that was to become a worldwide hit in little more than a decade. The story of the meteoric rise and catastrophic demise of the world's first smartphone.
cast.title: BlackBerry

details.biography: Stephanie Moran is a Canadian actress born and raised in Ottawa, Ontario. Stephanie began dancing at a young age, and continued to study ballet for many years. In 2012, she began acting in local short films, which ignited her passion for acting. Since then, she has appeared in both television and film, including Candy Skin (2016), Sidelined (2018), and Carter (2018). Stephanie currently resides in Toronto, Ontario (2018).
details.name: Stephanie Moran
